programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: When a beloved high school football player dies while shielding three girls from bullets in a random shooting, a city comes together to seek justice for a young life lost.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Mother of two, Ahkenya Johnson is found brutally stabbed 49 times and nearly decapitated, rocking the Niagara Falls community. Her husband Robert is the first to find her in a pool of blood…was he the last person to see her alive? He’s got an alibi, but will it convince authorities and Ahkenya’s family?↵↵

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: When hopeless romantic Rose Anglade met Paul Francois, she thought the Lord had finally given her someone she could grow old with. Eager to begin her new life with the man of her dreams, Rose takes Paul’s advice and sells her home in New York City and shares her assets with her soul mate. But unbeknownst to Rose, her smooth talking lothario has been carefully orchestrating his control over her finances, and when Francois disappears, it isn't just her money that he's taken.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Eric Clark was a loving son, brother and husband. He was a Navy veteran. He stood up for the United States. In order the make extra cash, aside from his regular job, he started up a bartending business. His wife told Eric that Atlanta has great deals in alcohol compared to Alabama, where they lived. One night, Eric made the drive to Atlanta to pick up alcohol for an event he had coming up. Little did Eric know, that would be the last drive he ever made.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: The Carr Brothers are troubled from a young age but nothing will compare to the harm they will inflict on the city of Wichita, KS. Then, Cory Cotham is no stranger to the law and holds little sacred, so when the promise of wealth has him crossing the line, there’s no telling how far he will go.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Troubled housewife Carolyn King deserts her family in search of a clean slate, only to find her perfect match in a local convict Bradley Martin. Next, teen mom Angel Glenn risks it all to support her baby. But when she crosses paths with a bad boy, Angel leaves her world of seduction for a life of crime.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 28-year-old Michael Sandy was a young designer and social butterfly who lived in a trendy borough of Brooklyn. In addition to his close friends, Michael sought companionship through online chat rooms. But on an October night in 2006, Michael’s fun turned to horror when his habit of trusting strangers on the Internet placed him in a life-threatening position. To bring Michael justice, investigators must scour the web to put a face to a screen name.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: When immigrant Mamadou Berry is horrifically murdered, Quinn and Velazquez set out to find his killer. The yearlong investigation pits the detectives against the International Robbin Crew. A ruthless Atlanta gang that doesn’t hesitate to use deadly force on their targets.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: In 1989 in New York, a vicious assault on a female jogger sparks a racially driven witch-hunt for her attackers, and police employ aggressive tactics to coerce confessions from five young men whose lives will change forever.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Tamika Huston had big dreams of becoming a singer and a promising future ahead of her, but when she inexplicably goes missing, friends and family worry they’ll never get to see her reach her full potential. A bad-boy boyfriend in Tamika’s past prompts investigators to wonder if perhaps he had something to do with her disappearance. The search for answers will lead law enforcement down a slew of different paths—will they ever be able to track down this beautiful young songstress?

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Corey Jenkins was a dual athlete with a potential pro career in either baseball or football. When the time comes to sign a management agency, Corey is convinced by local agents that they are the only agents that will look out for his true interests - the only agents he can trust. But while everything seems to run smoothly at first, Corey is soon faced with money problems, despite a substantial signing bonus he received when he was drafted. Slow to suspect his slick talking agents, by the time Corey realizes he has been victimized by the very people he trusted, it is too late.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Charles Smith was a bright young man with huge musical aspirations. On one fateful night, all his dreams came to a close when he was found nearly dead at a crossroads in Atlanta. Quinn and Vince hit the streets and begin asking questions of what appears to be a homicide. After digging deeper into the party scene in Atlanta, they soon realize that the killer could be someone they never expected.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: In Bethesda, Maryland, Brittany Norwood’s quick fall from grace lands her in the center of a murder investigation that rattles the community. And later, in Pennsylvania, an irresistible sin creeps up behind a husband and wife meant to be together…until death do they part.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: When Felicia Scott’s man demands a child she can’t give him, she dives into a homicidal tailspin to get him exactly what he wants. Then, Victoria Jackson commits the ultimate act of betrayal against one of her own family members, at her dangerously jealous man’s request.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 22-year-old Shannon Griffin was the new guy in St. Petersburg, Florida. Handsome but painfully shy, Shannon had trouble meeting friends in his new town – he preferred to stay home alone and play video games. So it came as an utter shock to his family when he is found shot to death behind an abandoned home. Detectives discover that Shannon turned to the Internet to meet new people. He made tons of friends online – but now that he was found dead, it appeared he also made some enemies.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Eric Clark was a loving son, brother and husband. He was a Navy veteran. He stood up for the United States. In order the make extra cash, aside from his regular job, he started up a bartending business. His wife told Eric that Atlanta has great deals in alcohol compared to Alabama, where they lived. One night, Eric made the drive to Atlanta to pick up alcohol for an event he had coming up. Little did Eric know, that would be the last drive he ever made.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: In Louisville, Kentucky, a young woman is killed overnight during a botched raid on her apartment. Her outraged community comes together to demand her killers be brought to justice and sparks a nationwide call for police reform.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Tamika Huston had big dreams of becoming a singer and a promising future ahead of her, but when she inexplicably goes missing, friends and family worry they’ll never get to see her reach her full potential. A bad-boy boyfriend in Tamika’s past prompts investigators to wonder if perhaps he had something to do with her disappearance. The search for answers will lead law enforcement down a slew of different paths—will they ever be able to track down this beautiful young songstress?

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Tammi McCreary thought she had met the man of her dreams in Eric Perteet. A charismatic and ambitious doctor from Chicago, Eric quickly swept Tammi off her feet. But Eric was not what he seemed to be. Shortly after their wedding, Tammi's new husband is arrested at the local hospital, and she is faced with a string of shocking lies and the knowledge that she is not the only woman who has fallen prey to Eric's deceitful ways.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Valerie Payton was a hardworking mother who cared for her son dearly. So much in fact, she resorted to prostitution to give her son a better life than her own. One fateful evening, Valerie Payton lured a man who would do the unthinkable. After 10 years of Valerie’s unsolved case, Quinn and Vince hit the streets and uncover the monster behind Valerie Payton’s disappearance.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: Coral Watts’ murderous appetite is only getting worse with age as he tries to limit his exposure to law enforcement by getting out of town. Then, Stephen Hill takes his bromance a little too far and his jealousy may cost him everything.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Mark Schaller was new to the Atlanta area. While out one night in early October 2002, Mark began chatting with another patron at a bar. Chatting quickly became something more and that was to Mark’s liking. Unfortunately, it turned out to be something no one could dreamt of. Quinn and Vince are assigned the case. As they dig deeper and deeper into who committed this heinous crime, they soon realize that this was no personal attack and that the killer could be linked to something far greater.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Shy, anonymous twenty year old Debra Brown falls for serial child predator Alton Coleman and gets pulled into his twisted and deadly world. Later, seventeen year old Chakkira Wonnum escapes an abusive home only to run into the arms of a dangerous drug addict who forces her to commit an unspeakable act.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: When a local lottery winner in Lakeland, FL spends his winnings and disappears after enlisting the aid of a financial advisor, his sensational rags-to-riches story ultimately ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: When 911 dispatchers receive a frantic call from Elicia Hughes that her husband has just been shot, officers arrive to find a devastated Elicia and her husband Brian lying in a pool of blood. The ensuing investigation uncovers allegations of infidelity and a surprising suspect.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Abraham Kennard was a fast-talking pastor with an ambitious real estate investment opportunity. Hundreds of pastors and parishioners from churches across the country were lured by Kennard’s lavish lifestyle and promises of enormous returns. But though the millions poured in, the returns never poured out, revealing this supposed man of God…to be a man of greed.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Mark Schaller was new to the Atlanta area. While out one night in early October 2002, Mark began chatting with another patron at a bar. Chatting quickly became something more and that was to Mark’s liking. Unfortunately, it turned out to be something no one could dreamt of. Quinn and Vince are assigned the case. As they dig deeper and deeper into who committed this heinous crime, they soon realize that this was no personal attack and that the killer could be linked to something far greater.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: Willa Blanc will put her son’s loyalty to the test when she takes an unrighteous path in search of riches… and later, Oklahoma drifter Cedric Norris’ road to redemption is suppressed by the devilish voices in his head.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Yvette Gay is a simple girl desperate for companionship and when she falls for an angry man, he drags her into a murderous plot. Vishawn Mills finds the man of her dreams but when an innocent friendship with the landlord intimidates her jealous boyfriend, her dream becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: Baltimore is a vibrant city, but it’s also a town plagued by a history of violent crime. When the younger brother of the Baltimore Police Department’s spokesperson is gunned down in his apartment, the investigation reveals a suspect close to home.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Abraham Kennard was a fast-talking pastor with an ambitious real estate investment opportunity. Hundreds of pastors and parishioners from churches across the country were lured by Kennard’s lavish lifestyle and promises of enormous returns. But though the millions poured in, the returns never poured out, revealing this supposed man of God…to be a man of greed.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: Siohban Lee was a bubbly teen that you could always find on her phone scrolling through social media or hard at work earning money for college. That is, until she was found shot to death one wintery night in Washington DC. With almost nothing to go on from the scene of the crime, detectives turn to the pages of social media to find out who would want to hurt this beautiful barista. Little did they know, Siohban’s online accounts would lead them straight to her killer.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: Tyrone Page tries to take the high road while his twin, Jerome, prefers lower alternatives but fate leads them both to life on the dark side. Then, AJ Nelson’s life of rejection and heartache leaves him destitute. With nothing to lose, someone will pay the ultimate price from his pursuit of wealth.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Troubled housewife Carolyn King deserts her family in search of a clean slate, only to find her perfect match in a local convict Bradley Martin. Next, teen mom Angel Glenn risks it all to support her baby. But when she crosses paths with a bad boy, Angel leaves her world of seduction for a life of crime.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: As tensions rise between black liberation group, MOVE, and Philadelphia police, city officials drop a bomb on the group’s headquarters, killing most of its members and leaving several other citizens homeless.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Latonya Bowman and Jamal Rogers were one month shy of welcoming their baby boy into the world when the unthinkable happened. Latonya is kidnapped, set on fire, shot, and left for dead. As Latonya fights to save her life and the life of her unborn son, detectives try to figure out who would want to harm her – and in such a violent way. As this mystery begins to unravel they uncover a selfish murder plot that sends shockwaves throughout the Detroit community – and the entire country.↵↵

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: When hopeless romantic Rose Anglade met Paul Francois, she thought the Lord had finally given her someone she could grow old with. Eager to begin her new life with the man of her dreams, Rose takes Paul’s advice and sells her home in New York City and shares her assets with her soul mate. But unbeknownst to Rose, her smooth talking lothario has been carefully orchestrating his control over her finances, and when Francois disappears, it isn't just her money that he's taken.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: The detectives take the case of a homeless man who was shot and killed thinking it will be a simple case. However, after reports come back matching the murder scene to other ongoing murder cases, Quinn and Velazquez realize they’re after a serial killer.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 14-year-old Shaniesha Forbes, was your typical American teenager. If she wasn’t hanging out with family or friends, she was busy scrolling through facebook, planning her next event on her busy social calendar. But when Shaniesha failed to come home from school or answer her phone in January of 2013, her mother knew something was terribly wrong. The search for the truth would expose the dark side of social media.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: In Towson, MD young Lewin Powell III is known in his upper-middle class community as the good son. But when years of academic pressure from his parents come to a head, Lewin snaps unleashing hell on his mother. Later, church leaders Christy and Neil Edgar’s strong belief in discipline takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: When Felicia Scott’s man demands a child she can’t give him, she dives into a homicidal tailspin to get him exactly what he wants. Then, Victoria Jackson commits the ultimate act of betrayal against one of her own family members, at her dangerously jealous man’s request.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: Texas has a rich and diverse history, but in 2015, the city of Houston falls prey to string of lethal armored car robberies striking terror in the streets. Investigators must pull off an elaborate sting operation to bring the perpetrators to justice.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A modern day Bonnie and Clyde, Shanda Merritt and Carl Davis had penchant for criminal behavior. But when Carl decides to leave Shanda and go on the straight and narrow, it sparks a chain reaction of heinous acts leaving one man dead and another in critical condition.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Corey Jenkins was a dual athlete with a potential pro career in either baseball or football. When the time comes to sign a management agency, Corey is convinced by local agents that they are the only agents that will look out for his true interests - the only agents he can trust. But while everything seems to run smoothly at first, Corey is soon faced with money problems, despite a substantial signing bonus he received when he was drafted. Slow to suspect his slick talking agents, by the time Corey realizes he has been victimized by the very people he trusted, it is too late.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 15-year-old Mikarah Sanders and 16-year-old Matthew DuBois were two typical teenagers in a whirlwind romance. The two were inseparable; when they weren’t together, they were messaging on MySpace. But when a New Year’s Eve in Seattle ends in the mysterious shooting of Mikarah and Matthew, police scour social media to piece together the crime. Their search for answers would reveal a tale of jealousy, rage, and the murder of an innocent teen.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: On a hot summer night in early August, two assailants attempt to rob a man’s house, who is rumored to have a great deal of cash within his house. As events unfold, a simple robbery ends up leaving a young, engaged couple murdered. Quinn and Velazquez are assigned the case only to discover that time wasn’t on the young couple’s side.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: Family is all that matters to Kim Wolfe until she meets Stacie. As the relationship goes south, Kim finds herself questioning everything, even her sanity. Then, Robert Barnes leads a charmed life with gifts beyond measure but when tragedy strikes, he may find himself standing in the crossfire.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Shy, anonymous twenty year old Debra Brown falls for serial child predator Alton Coleman and gets pulled into his twisted and deadly world. programme.title: Sins of the City

programme.title: Deceived

Shots are fired and Jerrick is hit and ends up dead. This is now a homicide and Quinn and Vince rush to the scene. They quickly uncover that crime has no age limit and focus in on a group of teens who ended Jerrick’s life on that fateful early morning.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide

Anthony Gant, shot during a major event being held in the village green, in view of many. It soon becomes clear someone may have wished to kill both to cover up a dark truth, and soon Barnaby has to figure out who amongst the village wanted both dead, complicated further when Gant's curate is murdered next.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A disused airfield near Morton Fendle is the location for a romantic evening between young Simon Bright and his girlfriend Laura Sharp - absolutely nothing could ruin their date. The next morning, when Frances Kirby is out for her morning jog, she notices the vintage car they were in up at the airfield, containing Simon Bright's dead body, with Laura nowhere to be seen. Confused, Detective Chief Inspector Barnaby and D.S. Jones can't work out whether it was a suicide pact or murder. Furthermore, they've got to find Miss Sharp and their investigation leads them to linking Simon and Laura with the villagers of Morton Fendle, who met at Elaine Trim's dancing classes. Eventually, the Barnaby family plus Jones make it to a 40s style dance night at the village hall before more villagers start turning up dead.

programme.title: Fastlane

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: In a volatile and unpredictable world, the show will be the definitive guide for the global news audience to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day. With news making executives, officials and thought-leaders from the world of business, politics and academia we will explore a story through probing interviews and nuanced conversations. The hour of programming will also highlight the most relevant stories from India which is currently one of the hottest investment destinations, but also has compelling stories that play into the Bloomberg's priority issues such as Climate change, Diversity and Technological innovation.

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: American use of the Southeast Asian plant kratom has grown dramatically in recent years, spurring both a lucrative industry and national lobbying effort while worrying health experts who fear its addictive effects and point to thousands of related deaths. In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: Completed Episodes
programme.desc: Amanda teams up with creative dynamo Jesse Littlebird at the renowned Indian Pueblo Cultural Center. They embark on a vibrant journey through Albuquerque's thriving Indigenous art scene and celebrate the city's most innovative makers.

programme.title: Rickwood
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.desc: Kate learns how to play a Germantown street game, gets up close and personal with handcrafted, hand-charred bourbon barrels, and learns to fall back in love with whiskey – and natural wine.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Meet Reggie, a Greenville singer who lost his voice due to throat cancer. Justin and Ryan fulfill their promise by performing one of his songs to a theater filled with their fans. Later, Jimmy hits the streets to spread joy by serenading locals.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: 30 Min Documentaries
programme.desc: 30 Min Documentaries

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Witness extreme car chases captured on video, from fleeing via fire truck to off-roading into a corn field. Fortunately no one is seriously hurt – except, at times, the vehicles.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Booty shaking, vegan delights and more on two cheap dates in New Orleans.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: Four chefs with roots across the globe share mouth-watering specialties you won’t find anywhere else. From Wakanda braised beef to lamb Kibbeh and Chicken Tikka Masala, find some of Pittsburgh’s best international eats!

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: In 1990, an 18-year-old driving across Wisconsin to a job conference never arrives. After her van and later her body are discovered, the mystery surrounding Berit Beck’s death persists for more than two decades. What happened in that van?

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Escaping The Blade
programme.desc: Why California's sex traffickers are walking free while victims wait in fear and how organizations are fighting to protect survivors.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Host and comedic actor Amy Brassette McKeon challenges two sets of couples to pass a good time on a dime in their city. Find out which couple will experience the most amazing date for under fifty bucks.

programme.title: Farm to Fork: Growing a Movement
programme.desc: How cities are harnessing the power of agriculture to make real differences in the health and happiness of community members.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A young boy and his family's housekeeper are brutally killed in an upscale Omaha neighborhood. Their case goes cold for years, until another double homicide reveals the link and unmasks a serial killer.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Easy Money: Fraud, Fortune and Failures
programme.desc: (2021) With nearly 15 hours of interviews from 17 people – and dozens of hours of news footage — Easy Money tells the story of what is being called the worst fraud in California history.

programme.title: KCRA Local News
programme.desc: Get the latest news and weather from KCRA.

programme.title: News Fallback: Hour Long Docs
programme.desc: Long form storytelling from Very Local.

programme.title: News Fallback: Hour Long Docs
programme.desc: Long form storytelling from Very Local.

programme.title: KCRA Local News
programme.desc: Get the latest news and weather from KCRA.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: 84% of women have been harassed while running. Not Today, by Runner's World, examines this through the stories of three runners. Mollie Tibbetts and Wendy Martinez were both brutally murdered, while Kelly Herron fought off her attacker and survived.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: Amanda Machon meets with a different guest each episode who will show off their favorite spots in Albuquerque and the best way to experience this one-of-a-kind city. This series is all about discovering everything that makes ABQ unique and exciting.

programme.title: Completed Episodes
programme.desc: Scott's life revolves around everyone's favorite four-legged friends, from rescuing and caring for countless dogs, his spirit is unwavering. Today Meaghan gives back a day full of moments for him and his beloved canine companion.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.desc: Join WNBA player and Olympian Angel McCoughtry as she shows us the people and places that put Baltimore on the map. From sailing the Chesapeake, to sampling street foods, McCoughtry pulls back the curtain on what makes the Charm City so special.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Operation Iceman: Taking Down The Mafia's Hitman
programme.desc: During a volatile period of organized crime, ATF agent Dominick Polifrone assumes the role of a "wise-guy" to gain the confidence of and incriminate the mafia's most prolific hitman, Richard "The Iceman" Kuklinski. Authorities have known about the Iceman's talents for some time, but no one could have guessed how many people this mild mannered family man has killed. In a bold attempt to build a case, Agent Polifrone befriends the man many have called "the devil himself."

programme.title: Murder For Millions

programme.title: Author Of Death
programme.desc: Out on parole, an ex-con turned published author goes on a 24-hour killing spree. But when he unknowingly leaves one of his victims alive to identify him, cops launch a multistate manhunt and bring him to justice.

programme.title: A Son Snaps
programme.desc: After years of abuse, a high school valedictorian snaps, viciously stabbing his mother and leaving her for dead in the family's garage. Leaving behind zero forensic evidence at the crime scene, he almost gets away with her savage murder, except for a couple small inconsistencies in his alibi that reveal his true plans.

programme.title: Trailer Park Tragedy

programme.title: A Fugitive And A Killer
programme.desc: When one bodybuilder wants what another bodybuilder has, the end result is a murder-for-hire. The muscle-bound mastermind goes on the lam for nearly a decade only to resurface half a world away and kill a police officer before law enforcement brings him to justice.

programme.title: The Happy Face Killer
programme.desc: A long-haul trucker with a lust for killing crisscrosses the country looking for his next victim. Police don't connect any of this serial murderer's crimes until he slips up and takes out someone from his inner circle.

programme.desc: Follow what's happening across America with up-to-the minute details on the major events driving the day's top stories.

programme.title: Today As It Happened
programme.desc: What happened today? Find out as Scripps News gets you up to speed on the day's events that everyone is talking about.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Renowned Chef and cookbook author Dave Becker of Sweet Basil & Juniper battles experienced competitor Eric LeBlanc of Red Heat Tavern. Will their vast culinary knowledge help one rise to the top or will the blindfold trip up these high end chefs?

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: These stories center on people who saw others facing tough times in the midst of the pandemic and decided to do something about it.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A young boy and his family's housekeeper are brutally killed in an upscale Omaha neighborhood. Their case goes cold for years, until another double homicide reveals the link and unmasks a serial killer.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Sometimes, would-be criminals are their own worst enemies. This episode highlights crime “fails,” and the officers - and ordinary civilians - who save the day.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: A horrific accident doomed Allison to a lifetime of pain and failed surgeries. In search of a brighter smile, Mar-cia’s seen half a dozen dentists, but remains unsatisfied. Can FIXT tech meet the needs of their deserving clients?

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: Mikey’s getting married soon and the clock is ticking to get his teeth picture-perfect. Lynn’s embarrassed by the color of her teeth and won’t wait another moment for a white smile. Can the FIXT team get the work done in time?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core​​.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Who says you can't go home again? The team travels back to where it all began to pay back the kindness they experienced 25 years ago when they first got started.

programme.title: Completed Episodes
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero quizzes people in New Orleans about a starchy substance in a bathtub, animal mysteries and robots that do the darndest things.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: After transitioning and battling cancer, Madison Wilkins finally feels comfortable in her own skin. Kinga goes to Orlando, Florida to help Madison let her hair down and experience adventure as the woman she’s always longed to be.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed and Day venture to Verona and explore “the spot that’s more than a dot.” The guys play pickleball, dine on BBQ, get creative with splatter paint, and finish the day with a brew.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Survivor Stories: Life Beyond the Golden State Killer
programme.desc: Two Golden State Killer survivors help other sexual assault survivors heal.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: Whether it's a wrestling star training through grief, champion rollerskaters challenged on the world stage, or a cycling team pushing through obstacles, Iowans don't back down when the going gets tough.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: In McKees Rocks, Ed and Day examine the power of community service. The guys experience what it’s like to be a volunteer firefighter, bread maker, and full-service entertainer.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: These stories showcase courageous Americans who came to the rescue

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Glenda Macatangay has conquered her career and being a single mom to four kids. But when it comes to being comfortable in the outdoors, she isn’t as confident. Kinga meets up with Glenda in Sacramento, CA to introduce her to the wonders of the wilderness.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero is in Cincinnati asking locals questions about wild and wacky news stories that include some unbelievable weddings, kissing creatures and a swimming pool surprise.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Stay the course in the Driftless Region of Wisconsin when you explore the Troll Capital of the World. Join a mug club, satisfy your sweet tooth, and journey back in time as you fall asleep in a restored inn.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: In Orlando, our local experts tell you where to devour hummingbird cake, quench your thirst with an intoxicating fish bowl, and find the best bathrooms. These ‘City Beautiful’ experts know which spots are worth your time.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: The Spark
programme.desc: From professional hockey players to award-winning muralists, The Spark highlights the craft, the journey, and the joy. These masters and thought leaders may have made names for themselves on the national stage, but they never forget the city that sparks their inspiration daily

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: What's On The Menu?

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: News Fallback: Hour Long Docs
programme.desc: Long form storytelling from Very Local.

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Maddy & Dixie Take Sactown
programme.desc: Maddy & Dixie are social media influencers who have nothing but love for Sacramento. Join them as they explore the heart and soul of the city through incredible activities, hidden gems, amazing eats and the locals who make Sactown so special.

programme.title: Underdog Uprising
programme.desc: Every game day, fans pour into the stands to cheer on New Mexico's soccer team. But these are no ordinary supporters. From the Curse, to Sektor 114, to the Black Diamonds these fans are making New Mexico United.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A teenager vanishes from her home one fall morning in 1999. Her body is discovered 17 days later, seven miles away. It takes more than 15 years for the heartbreaking truth to come out.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Plate It!

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: When bones are discovered burned in a rural New Hampshire community, a horrific story begins to emerge…one that exposes the secrets of a charming killer living among them.

programme.title: Operation Iceman: Taking Down The Mafia's Hitman
programme.desc: During a volatile period of organized crime, ATF agent Dominick Polifrone assumes the role of a "wise-guy" to gain the confidence of and incriminate the mafia's most prolific hitman, Richard "The Iceman" Kuklinski. Authorities have known about the Iceman's talents for some time, but no one could have guessed how many people this mild mannered family man has killed. In a bold attempt to build a case, Agent Polifrone befriends the man many have called "the devil himself."

programme.title: A Son Snaps
programme.desc: After years of abuse, a high school valedictorian snaps, viciously stabbing his mother and leaving her for dead in the family's garage. Leaving behind zero forensic evidence at the crime scene, he almost gets away with her savage murder, except for a couple small inconsistencies in his alibi that reveal his true plans.

programme.title: Trailer Park Tragedy
programme.desc: A bizarre lover's triangle turns lethal and a mother of two suddenly disappears. Cops investigate the missing person's case but soon discover it's the coldest of coldhearted murders committed by two jilted ex-lovers.
